channel.title: Service to make app screenshots in a real location
channel.description:
[PlaceIt][1] is a service (free, I think) that takes your app screenshots, and makes an image out of them that makes it look like your app is running on a real phone, in a real location.
Should be of some use to mobile devs.
[1]: http://placeit.breezi.com/
